import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Kit 2 React helper functions
import rgba from"assets/theme/functions/rgba";import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var dark=colors.dark,white=colors.white;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{background:rgba(dark.main,0.2),height:pxToRem(1),margin:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," 0"),borderBottom:"none",opacity:0.25},vertical:{background:rgba(dark.main,0.2),width:pxToRem(1),height:"100%",margin:"0 ".concat(pxToRem(16)),borderRight:"none"},light:{background:rgba(white.main,0.2),"&.MuiDivider-vertical":{background:rgba(white.main,0.2)}}}};
